info.author: Hans-Christoph Steiner
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: Python Software Foundation License
Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
This is a python module for reading the data from an ID TECH credit
card reader connected via serial port (RS-232) or USB-CDC.  It was
written using an ID TECH Spectrum III MagStripe Only, Insert Reader,
model number SPT3-355-12-1NN0N-0C.

http://www.idtechproducts.com/products/insert-readers/68.html

The serial protocol is documented here (the URL says .html, but it
triggers the download of a PDF):
http://www.idtechproducts.com/download/insert-readers/doc_download/413-users-manual-sptiii-moir-product-family.html

It requires pySerial: http://pyserial.sourceforge.net/
info.name: pyidtech
info.summary: read data from ID TECH credit card readers
info.html_description:
This is a python module for reading the data from an ID TECH credit card reader connected via serial port (RS-232) or USB-CDC. It was written using an ID TECH Spectrum III MagStripe Only, Insert Reader, model number SPT3-355-12-1NN0N-0C.

http://www.idtechproducts.com/products/insert-readers/68.html

The serial protocol is documented here (the URL says .html, but it triggers the download of a PDF): http://www.idtechproducts.com/download/insert-readers/doc_download/413-users-manual-sptiii-moir-product-family.html

It requires pySerial: http://pyserial.sourceforge.net/
